Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Constellation Connect skill for Amazon Alexa enables you to control hundreds of paired smart home devices by simply using your voice*. 

The Constellation Connect skill allows you to ask Alexa to control your lights, switches, plugs, thermostats, and more. You can also invoke Scenes configured with Constellation Connect and ask for the status of supported devices. The Constellation Connect skill for Amazon Alexa is available to all Constellation Connect customers with an active monitoring plan and an Alexa enabled device (e.g. Amazon Echo).

Getting the Constellation Connect skill set up is as easy as 1, 2, 3!

1. Once you have searched for and found the Constellation Connect skill in the Alexa app, tap “ENABLE”. You will be prompted to sign in to the Constellation Connect portal to link your Constellation Connect account to Alexa.
2. Next, select the devices you’d like Alexa to control. You can enter custom names for each device (e.g. John’s room lamp, kitchen door, upstairs thermostat, etc.). Please note, you should avoid using any special characters such as underscore (_) when customizing the device names.
3. Finally, tap “Done” and then tap “DISCOVER DEVICES” or ask Alexa to “Discover Devices”. This process can take up to 20 seconds.

Take your smart home to the next level with Constellation Connect and Alexa!

For your security, at this time the ability to arm or disarm Constellation Connect or the ability to unlock doors is not supported by the Constellation Connect skill for Alexa.

Constellation Connect works with Amazon Alexa enabled devices*. If you have additional questions or require support, please visit https://constellationconnect.com/contact or email support@constellationconnect.com.

FIRMWARE UPDATE REQUIREMENT:
Your Constellation Connect Hub requires the latest version of firmware to support Alexa. Please ensure you are running the latest version (Settings > Firmware), before enabling the Constellation Connect skill.

* An active monitoring plan is required to activate and control smart home devices with the Constellation Connect smart home skill for Amazon Alexa.

Use of the Constellation Connect skill is subject to the Constellation Connect Terms of Use and Amazon Alexa Terms of Use. Amazon, Alexa and all related logos are trademarks of Amazon.com, Inc. or its affiliates.
